chrome_permissions

Top-Level Variables
permissions: ChromePermissions
Classes
ChromePermissions

Use the chrome.permissions API to request [declared optional permissions](#manifest) at run time rather than install time, so users understand why the permissions are needed and grant only those that are necessary.

Top-Level Variables

static final ChromePermissions permissions

Class ChromePermissions

Fields
onAdded: Stream
onRemoved: Stream
Getters and Setters
onAdded: Stream<dynamic>
onRemoved: Stream<dynamic>
Methods
contains(dynamic permissions, dynamic callback): void
getAll(dynamic callback): void
remove(dynamic permissions, dynamic callback): void
request(dynamic permissions, dynamic callback): void

Fields

final Stream onAdded
final Stream onRemoved

Getters and Setters

Stream<dynamic> get onAdded

Fired when the extension acquires new permissions.

Stream<dynamic> get onRemoved

Fired when access to permissions has been removed from the extension.

Methods

void contains(dynamic permissions, dynamic callback)

Checks if the extension has the specified permissions.

void getAll(dynamic callback)

Gets the extension's current set of permissions.

void remove(dynamic permissions, dynamic callback)

Removes access to the specified permissions. If there are any problems removing the permissions, runtime.lastError will be set.

void request(dynamic permissions, dynamic callback)

Requests access to the specified permissions. These permissions must be defined in the optional_permissions field of the manifest. If there are any problems requesting the permissions, runtime.lastError will be set.
